title: station
description: Stations in a QR-code based audio game

type.description: Type of station. Can be 'station' or 'help'

startStationId.description: Only available on the help station. This is the station that the gets executed on the first scan of the help station qr code

description.description: Information about the station. Not visible to the user

helpAudioFilenames.description: Filename including file name extension. Order is important. The first represent the first help track and so on

helpCost.description: How expensive is it to ask for help at this station

events.description: Array containing events that executing a station will fire

filePath.description: The relative path to the file the station definition was loaded from. This is value is added by the validation script to make the validation error output more useable.
